data.prayer: the state of North Ossetia has (about) 10,579 people who know Jesus, 405,751 people who know about him culturally, and 306,570 people who are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of North Ossetia, Russia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of North Ossetia, Russia.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.section_summary: On average, 103 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in North Ossetia, Russia.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, fill the 10,579 believers in the state of North Ossetia with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of North Ossetia.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Lezgin people. Make the Lezgin people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, encourage the 10,579 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of North Ossetia to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 10,579 believers in North Ossetia, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.
